mapper.insert: insert into user (user_act, user_pwd, user_name, user_email, user_number, user_id_number, user_state, department_id, role_id, salt ) values (#{user_act}, #{user_pwd}, #{user_name}, #{user_email}, #{user_number}, #{user_id_number}, #{user_state}, #{department_id}, #{role_id}, #{salt} )
mapper.select: select auth.auth_id id, auth_pid pid, auth_name title, auth_resource resourcePath, open isOpen from user, role_auth, auth where user_id = #{user_id} and user.role_id = role_auth.role_id and auth.auth_id = role_auth.auth_id and auth.open = 1

select auth.auth_id id, auth_pid pid, auth_name title, auth_resource resourcePath, open isOpen from role, role_auth, auth where role.role_id = #{role_id} and role.role_id = role_auth.role_id and auth.auth_id = role_auth.auth_id
select auth.auth_id id, auth_pid pid, auth_name title, auth_resource resourcePath, open isOpen from auth
select user_id,user_name,department_id,role_id from user where user_name like '%${user_name}%'
